verses.verse: And Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

On the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the first <S%H259><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> shalt thou rear up <S%H6965><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>.
And thou shalt put <S%H7760><s%> therein <S%H8033><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%>, and thou shalt screen <S%H5526><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> with the veil <S%H6532><s%>.

And thou shalt bring <S%H935><s%> in the table <S%H7979><s%>, and set in order <S%H6186><s%> the things that are upon it <S%H6187><s%>; and thou shalt bring <S%H935><s%> in the candlestick <S%H4501><s%>, and light <S%H5927><s%> the lamps thereof <S%H5216><s%>.

And thou shalt set <S%H5414><s%> the golden <S%H2091><s%> altar <S%H4196><s%> for incense <S%H7004><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> the screen <S%H4539><s%> of the door <S%H6607><s%> to the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>.

And thou shalt set <S%H5414><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the tent <S%H4908><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>.
And thou shalt set <S%H5414><s%> the laver <S%H3595><s%> between the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%> and the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and shalt put <S%H5414><s%> water therein <S%H4325><s%>.
And thou shalt set up <S%H7760><s%> the court <S%H2691><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, and hang up <S%H5414><s%> the screen <S%H4539><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%>.

And thou shalt take <S%H3947><s%> the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>, and anoint <S%H4886><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, and all that is therein <S%H6942><s%>, and shalt hallow it <S%H3627><s%>, and all the furniture thereof <S%H6944><s%>: and it shall be holy.

And thou shalt anoint <S%H4886><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%>, and all its vessels <S%H3627><s%>, and sanctify <S%H6942><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%>: and the altar <S%H4196><s%> shall be most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%>.
And thou shalt anoint <S%H4886><s%> the laver <S%H3595><s%> and its base <S%H3653><s%>, and sanctify it <S%H6942><s%>.

And thou shalt bring <S%H7126><s%> Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> unto the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, and shalt wash <S%H7364><s%> them with water <S%H4325><s%>.

And thou shalt put <S%H3847><s%> upon Aaron <S%H175><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> garments <S%H899><s%>; and thou shalt anoint <S%H4886><s%> him <S%H6942><s%>, and sanctify him <S%H3547><s%>, that he may minister unto me in the priest's office.
And thou shalt bring <S%H7126><s%> his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and put <S%H3847><s%> coats upon them <S%H3801><s%>;

and thou shalt anoint <S%H4886><s%> them <S%H4886><s%>, as thou didst anoint their father <S%H1><s%>, that they may minister unto me in the priest <S%H3547><s%>'s office: and their anointing <S%H4888><s%> shall be to them for an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> priesthood <S%H3550><s%> throughout their generations <S%H1755><s%>.
Thus did <S%H6213><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>: according to all that Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> him <S%H6213><s%>, so did he.

And it came to pass in the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> in the second <S%H8145><s%> year <S%H8141><s%>, on the first <S%H259><s%> day of the month <S%H2320><s%>, that the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> was reared up <S%H6965><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> reared up <S%H6965><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, and laid <S%H5414><s%> its sockets <S%H134><s%>, and set up <S%H7760><s%> the boards <S%H7175><s%> thereof <S%H5414><s%>, and put in the bars <S%H1280><s%> thereof <S%H6965><s%>, and reared up its pillars <S%H5982><s%>.

And he spread the tent <S%H168><s%> over <S%H6566><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> the covering <S%H168><s%> of the tent <S%H4908><s%> above <S%H4605><s%> upon it <S%H3068><s%>; as Jehovah commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And he took <S%H3947><s%> and put <S%H5414><s%> the testimony <S%H5715><s%> into the ark <S%H727><s%>, and set <S%H7760><s%> the staves <S%H905><s%> on the ark <S%H727><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> the mercy-seat <S%H3727><s%> above <S%H4605><s%> upon the ark <S%H727><s%>:

and he brought <S%H935><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> into the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, and set up <S%H7760><s%> the veil <S%H6532><s%> of the screen <S%H4539><s%>, and screened <S%H5526><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%>; as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And he put <S%H5414><s%> the table <S%H7979><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, upon the side <S%H3409><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> northward <S%H6828><s%>, without <S%H2351><s%> the veil <S%H6532><s%>.
And he set <S%H6187><s%> the bread <S%H3899><s%> in order <S%H6186><s%> upon it before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And he put <S%H7760><s%> the candlestick <S%H4501><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, over against <S%H5227><s%> the table <S%H7979><s%>, on the side <S%H3409><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> southward <S%H5045><s%>.
And he lighted <S%H5927><s%> the lamps <S%H5216><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>; as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.
And he put <S%H7760><s%> the golden <S%H2091><s%> altar <S%H4196><s%> in the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the veil <S%H6532><s%>:
and he burnt <S%H6999><s%> thereon incense <S%H7004><s%> of sweet <S%H5561><s%> spices <S%H3068><s%>; as Jehovah commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.
And he put <S%H7760><s%> the screen <S%H4539><s%> of the door <S%H6607><s%> to the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>.

And he set <S%H7760><s%> the altar <S%H4196><s%> of burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> at the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> of the tent <S%H4908><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, and offered <S%H5927><s%> upon it the burnt-offering <S%H5930><s%> and the meal-offering <S%H4503><s%>; as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And he set <S%H7760><s%> the laver <S%H3595><s%> between the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%> and the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> therein <S%H7364><s%>, wherewith to wash.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> washed <S%H7364><s%> their hands <S%H3027><s%> and their feet thereat <S%H7272><s%>;

when they went <S%H935><s%> into the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, and when they came near <S%H7126><s%> unto the altar <S%H4196><s%>, they washed <S%H7364><s%>; as Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

And he reared up <S%H6965><s%> the court <S%H2691><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> and the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and set up <S%H5414><s%> the screen <S%H4539><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%>. So Moses <S%H4872><s%> finished <S%H3615><s%> the work <S%H4399><s%>.

Then the cloud <S%H6051><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, and the glory <S%H3519><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> was not able <S%H3201><s%> to enter <S%H935><s%> into the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%>, because the cloud <S%H6051><s%> abode <S%H7931><s%> thereon <S%H3519><s%>, and the glory of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> filled <S%H4390><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>.

And when the cloud <S%H6051><s%> was taken up <S%H5927><s%> from <S%H5921><s%> over the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went onward <S%H5265><s%>, throughout all their journeys <S%H4550><s%>:
but if the cloud <S%H6051><s%> was not taken up <S%H5927><s%>, then they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> not till the day <S%H3117><s%> that it was taken up <S%H5927><s%>.

For the cloud <S%H6051><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> was upon the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> by day <S%H3119><s%>, and there was fire <S%H784><s%> therein by night <S%H3915><s%>, in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of all the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, throughout all their journeys <S%H4550><s%>.
